description: The judge says Peter Shields' "blatant" breaking of the law had risked "vulnerable" people's health.
title: Coronavirus: Man jailed for visiting Manx homeless charity 'for dinner' after UK trip
title_page: Coronavirus: Man jailed for visiting Manx homeless charity 'for dinner' after UK trip - BBC News
maintext: Officers visited his home to find him not there and, when they contacted him by telephone, he said he was at Graih, on Broadway in Douglas, "having dinner".
